title: Ginger and Fig
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Burger restaurant where the chef is willing to accommodate vegan requests with advanced reservation (at least 72 hours). Ask for a vegan burger and try the cold chocolate soya milk shake.
streetAddress: Shop 5, Brooklyn Centre, 751 Jan Shoba Street
